title: How To Prepare For A Value Rally
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Jonathan Boyar, president of Boyar’s Intrinsic Value Research, explains his investing approach at a time when market leadership may be shifting to value. If he had to pick a sector exhibiting classic value characteristics, Boyar would focus on bank stocks. He explains the undesirability of investing in energy stocks whose fortunes shift on the price of oil, and why investors could do better than to buy fallen FAANGs. Boyar instead favors stocks left out of the major indexes, and names two that he believes Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
